tasks.title: Parallel Execution: Run 2-3 concurrent workers
tasks.description: Add parallel task execution to loopwork with 2-3 concurrent workers. Opt-in via --parallel flag, sequential remains default. Uses atomic task claiming to prevent race conditions.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Config → ParallelRunner → Workers → claimTask() → CliExecutor → markCompleted()
integrationCheck.testRequired: E2E test: --parallel 2 → two workers claim different tasks → both complete without conflicts

tasks.title: Parallel: Add config types (parallel, parallelFailureMode)
tasks.description: Add ParallelFailureMode type ('continue'|'abort-all'), parallel field (number), and parallelFailureMode field to LoopworkConfig. Update DEFAULT_CONFIG with parallel:1, parallelFailureMode:'continue'. Export new type from contracts/index.ts.

tasks.title: Parallel: Add --parallel and --sequential CLI flags
tasks.description: Add parseParallelOption() helper (returns 2 if no value). Add .option('--parallel [count]') and .option('--sequential') to commander. Update Config interface. Add merge logic in getConfig(). Register flags in index.ts run command and RUN_ARGS.

tasks.title: Parallel: Add claimTask() to TaskBackend interface
tasks.description: Add optional claimTask?(options?: FindTaskOptions): Promise<Task | null> to TaskBackend interface in contracts/backend.ts. Add JSDoc explaining atomic find + mark in-progress behavior.

tasks.title: Parallel: Implement claimTask() in JsonTaskAdapter
tasks.description: Implement claimTask() in backends/json.ts: wrap in withLock(), load tasks file, filter pending by feature/priority/parent/topLevel, sort by priority, filter blocked tasks via areDependenciesMet(), handle startFrom, mark entry as in-progress, save atomically, return full task.

tasks.title: Parallel: Create ParallelRunner class
tasks.description: Create src/core/parallel-runner.ts with: WORKER_COLORS array, WorkerResult/ParallelState/ParallelRunnerOptions/ParallelRunStats interfaces, ParallelRunner class with run() method (worker pool via Promise.allSettled, circuit breaker check), runWorker() method (claim task, create context, call hooks, execute CLI, handle success/failure), abort(), getState(), resetInterruptedTasks(), getStats().

tasks.title: Parallel: Update ICliExecutor interface
tasks.description: Add optional taskId parameter to execute() method. Add cleanup(): Promise<void> method for process cleanup on shutdown.

tasks.title: Parallel: Integrate ParallelRunner into run command
tasks.description: In commands/run.ts: import ParallelRunner, add parallel info to startup log, add branch after pendingCount check (if parallel > 1 call runParallel), create runParallel() function with signal handlers, resume support, plugin hooks. Add saveParallelState/loadParallelState/clearParallelState helpers. Update examples in createRunCommand().

tasks.title: Parallel: Write unit tests for ParallelRunner
tasks.description: Create test/parallel-runner.test.ts with: mock task helper, mock backend with claimTask tracking, mock CLI executor with configurable exit codes, mock logger. Test suites: Worker Pool (2), Task Claiming (2), Circuit Breaker (2), Failure Modes (2), Resume (2), Statistics (2), Dry Run (1). Total 13 tests.

tasks.title: Parallel: Write integration tests
tasks.description: Create test/integration/parallel.test.ts with: test dir helpers, setupTestTasks (creates tasks.json + PRDs), test CLI executor with tracking. Test suites: Full Stack (3), Failure Handling (2), State Management (2), claimTask Atomicity (1), Task Dependencies (3). Total 11 tests.

tasks.title: Update root loopwork.config.ts to use correct imports
tasks.description: Replace legacy import paths with proper package imports

tasks.title: Update README examples to use @loopwork-ai scope
tasks.description: Update all documentation examples to use @loopwork-ai package names

tasks.title: Add end-to-end integration test for init workflow
tasks.description: Create comprehensive integration test that runs init and verifies all generated files

tasks.title: Improve CLI error handling and user feedback
tasks.description: Add better error messages and recovery suggestions for common failure scenarios

tasks.title: Add CLI progress indicators for long-running operations
tasks.description: Show spinners or progress bars during task execution and file operations

tasks.title: Teleloop: Implement 'Overseer' IPC Communication
tasks.description: Establish structured IPC channel between bot and loop process to enable interactive approvals (buttons) and structured questions instead of raw stdin/stdout.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Telegram bot → IPCHandler.parseOutput() → IPCMessage → handleMessage() → loopwork stdin
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: IPC messages parsed from stdout, button callbacks reach loopwork via stdin, non-IPC logs still display

tasks.title: Teleloop: Voice-to-Task (Audio Notes)
tasks.description: Enable Telegram voice notes support. Transcribe audio using an API (e.g. OpenAI Whisper or Google STT) and parse intent to create tasks.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Telegram voice → audio download → transcription API → intent parser → task creation
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: voice file → transcribed text → created task in backend

tasks.title: Teleloop: 'Vision' Bug Reporting
tasks.description: Handle image uploads in Telegram. Save image to .specs/attachments and create a task referencing it for multimodal AI analysis.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Telegram image → file download → .specs/attachments → task creation with reference
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: image upload → file saved → task references correct path

tasks.title: Teleloop: Smart Daily Briefings
tasks.description: Generate AI summaries of loop activity (completed tasks, errors, files modified) and send a daily briefing to the user.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Loop state → activity aggregator → LLM summarizer → Telegram message
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: mock state data → generated summary contains expected info

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Intelligent Log Watcher & Auto-Healer
tasks.description: Implement an intelligent meta-monitor that watches loopwork logs in real-time, detects issues (missing PRDs, rate limits, config errors), and automatically takes corrective actions.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Log file → LogWatcher → PatternDetector → HealingAction → Verification
integrationCheck.testRequired: E2E test: write error to log → monitor detects → action triggered → state updated

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Core Infrastructure (LogWatcher + PatternDetector)
tasks.description: Create AIMonitor class with event emitter, LogWatcher using chokidar (event-driven + 2s polling), and PatternDetector with regex matchers for known errors.

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Concurrency Manager
tasks.description: Implement per-provider/model concurrency limits with key-based queuing. acquire()/release() pattern. Prevents API rate limits.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: HealingAction → ConcurrencyManager.acquire() → execute → release()
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: concurrent healing actions respect limits, queued actions execute in order

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Circuit Breaker
tasks.description: Implement circuit breaker pattern (closed/open/half-open states). 3 failures → 60s cooldown. Prevents infinite healing loops.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Failed action → CircuitBreaker.recordFailure() → state transition → blocked actions
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: 3 failures → circuit opens → actions blocked → cooldown → half-open → success → closed

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Auto-Create PRD Action
tasks.description: When 'PRD file not found' detected, read task metadata from tasks.json and generate stub PRD with title, goal, and placeholder requirements.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Log error detected → read tasks.json → generate PRD → write to .specs/tasks/
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: 'PRD not found' log → PRD file created with correct task metadata

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Task Recovery (Early Exit Enhancement)
tasks.description: Detect early task exits, analyze failure reason, and enhance PRD/docs/tests for retry. Improve task context so loop has better success on next attempt.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Early exit detected → failure analysis → PRD enhancement → task state reset
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: task fails early → PRD updated with failure context → task retry-ready

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Verification Engine
tasks.description: Implement verification-before-completion protocol. Require fresh evidence (<5 min). Run BUILD/TEST/LINT checks before claiming healing success.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Healing complete → VerificationEngine.verify() → run checks → pass/fail decision
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: stale evidence rejected, fresh evidence accepted, all checks must pass

tasks.title: AI Monitor: Wisdom System (Learn from Healing)
tasks.description: Store learned error patterns in .loopwork/ai-monitor/. Track what fixes work, accumulate wisdom across sessions, expire old patterns after 30 days.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Successful healing → WisdomStore.record() → persist to disk → load on next session
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: heal error → wisdom saved → restart → wisdom loaded → same error uses learned fix

tasks.title: AI Monitor: LLM Fallback Analyzer
tasks.description: For unknown errors, send to LLM (haiku) for analysis. Throttle to max 10 calls/session, 5-min cooldown. Cache responses for 24h.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Unknown error → LLMAnalyzer → API call → cache response → return analysis
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: unknown error → LLM called → response cached → same error uses cache
integrationCheck.notes: Implementation complete. All 20 tests passing. Includes: LLM integration with Haiku model, rate limiting (10 calls/session, 5-min cooldown), 24h response caching, proper cache schema, graceful error handling, and session state tracking.

tasks.title: AI Monitor: CLI Command (loopwork ai-monitor)
tasks.description: Create 'loopwork ai-monitor --watch' command and '--with-ai-monitor' flag for 'loopwork start'. Add to CLI help and documentation.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: CLI args → getConfig() → AIMonitor initialization → monitor running
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: CLI flag → config includes ai-monitor settings → monitor starts (avoid cliConfig bug pattern!)

tasks.title: Fix CLI output streaming - output not showing in real-time
tasks.description: Fixed by coordinating StreamLogger output with progress bar via lastOutputTime timestamp. Also fixed cliConfig not being passed through getConfig().

integrationCheck.notes: Bug found: cliConfig was not passed through getConfig(). Fixed and integration tests added to cli-config.test.ts.

tasks.title: Process Management: Robust Child Process Lifecycle & Orphan Cleanup
tasks.description: Implement robust child process management with proper lifecycle tracking, orphan detection, and cleanup. Use dependency inversion for testability. Parent task for sub-tasks a-f.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: CliExecutor → ProcessManager → spawn/track/kill → OrphanDetector → cleanup
integrationCheck.testRequired: E2E test: start loop → kill parent unexpectedly → orphan detected → cleanup executed

tasks.title: Process Management: IProcessManager Interface (Dependency Inversion)
tasks.description: Define IProcessManager interface with spawn(), kill(), track(), listChildren(), cleanup() methods. CliExecutor depends on interface, not concrete implementation. Enables mocking in tests.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: CliExecutor constructor → inject IProcessManager → use interface methods
integrationCheck.testRequired: Unit test: CliExecutor with mock IProcessManager verifies all method calls

tasks.title: Process Management: ProcessRegistry (Track All Children)
tasks.description: Implement ProcessRegistry that tracks all spawned child processes with metadata (pid, command, startTime, parentPid, namespace). Persist to .loopwork/processes.json for crash recovery.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: spawn() → registry.add() → persist to disk → registry.list() reads from disk
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: spawn process → registry updated → restart app → registry loaded from disk

tasks.title: Process Management: OrphanDetector (Find Rogue Processes)
tasks.description: Implement OrphanDetector that scans for orphaned loopwork processes. Detect: 1) Processes in registry but parent dead, 2) Processes matching loopwork patterns not in registry, 3) Stale processes (running >timeout without activity).

integrationCheck.dataFlow: OrphanDetector.scan() → check registry → check running processes → return orphan list
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: spawn process → kill parent → detector finds orphan

tasks.title: Process Management: ProcessCleaner (Kill Orphans Safely)
tasks.description: Implement ProcessCleaner that safely terminates orphan processes. Use graceful shutdown: SIGTERM → wait 5s → SIGKILL. Log all cleanup actions. Update registry after cleanup.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: ProcessCleaner.cleanup(orphans) → SIGTERM → wait → SIGKILL → update registry
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: orphan process → cleaner kills → registry updated → process gone

tasks.title: Process Management: Unit Tests (Mocked Dependencies)
tasks.description: Comprehensive unit tests using mocked IProcessManager. Test: ProcessRegistry CRUD, OrphanDetector logic, ProcessCleaner sequences. No real processes spawned.

integrationCheck.notes: Unit tests use mocks, no real process spawning. Focus on logic correctness.

tasks.title: Process Management: Integration Tests (Real Processes)
tasks.description: Integration tests that spawn real child processes. Test: registry persistence across restarts, orphan detection with real PIDs, cleanup of real processes. Use short-lived test processes.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Test spawns real process → registry tracks → test kills parent → orphan detected → cleanup works
integrationCheck.testRequired: Self-testing: the integration tests ARE the integration check

tasks.title: Process Management: E2E Tests (Full Loop Scenario)
tasks.description: E2E tests simulating real failure scenarios. Test: 1) Start loopwork → crash parent → orphan cleaned on next start, 2) Multiple namespaces → each cleans own orphans, 3) Timeout scenario → stale process killed.

scenarios: crash-recovery: start loop → kill -9 parent → restart → orphans cleaned
namespace-isolation: two namespaces → crash one → only its orphans cleaned
stale-timeout: process exceeds 2x timeout → detected as stale → killed

integrationCheck.dataFlow: Full loopwork start → task execution → simulated crash → restart → verify cleanup
integrationCheck.testRequired: E2E scenarios prove the full system works under failure conditions

tasks.title: Process Management: CLI Commands (loopwork processes)
tasks.description: Add CLI commands for process management: 'loopwork processes list' (show tracked processes), 'loopwork processes clean' (kill orphans), 'loopwork processes clean --force' (kill all). Add --clean-orphans flag to 'loopwork start'.

integrationCheck.dataFlow: CLI args → getConfig() → ProcessManager methods → output results
integrationCheck.testRequired: Integration test: CLI commands work and produce expected output (avoid cliConfig bug pattern!)
